subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pitcher Miguel Batista, who will turn 36 in spring training, signed a three-year contract with the Mariners Thursday believed to be worth between $8 million and $9 million a year.
snippet: Pitcher Miguel Batista, who will turn 36 in spring training, signed a three-year contract with the Mariners Thursday believed to be worth between $8 million and $9 million a year.
